body: If you are reading this comment your curse is lifted forever and your parents will live. Copy this and paste it on 5 other manga so the curse is dispelled permanently God bless yall

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse

@corndude When I first save this one https://nhentai.net/g/307725/ I actually thought it was about Asui and after he had left the house to start living on his own. But yeah at this point I actually want to see Asui end up with someone instead of keep seeing Naomi. But I am pretty sure she is Juna's favorite character and he kinda tried to just give her and everyone in the NTR a sort of happy ending but instead it just showed how shitty she was to her kid and how much of an ass the friend was, with the son just ending up alone and leaving. I mean just look at this part which is probably set after he left. The friend promising to take care of her and he keeps on doing livestreams to fund their debauchery while the son is still running the risk of ppl goin "hey isn't this your mom?" or himself seeing that shit and god forbid turning into someone who just jerks of to his mom having sex.

I like a bunch of Naomi-san series 
Even tought she's a terrible mother
eww a slut whore mom leaving her kid for for a dick

Oh, and to people who want Asui to come back to his terrible mother and do some "chad" move. Moving on life and searching for success more than just staying and weeping about loss is a way more chad move on Asui's hand. He just doesn't fucking care about both of his mother and total shit of friend. To him they are just strangers now.
Also yeah, Juna loves milfs and is more interesed in making porn about Naomi more than showing how much of a horrible parent she is. Its better to just ignore about her horrible story now.

If I remember well, Juna just came back after some time and finishing some projects, like these little doujins and the mha one with Tsuyu, there is still no info about Asui but the idea about a series about him is there.
Even though this is fictional, Naomi is a failure of a mother 😔. Please let the mc come back 🙏 and beat the shit out of both the mom and ex friend
